title: Moles of gas in a sample

content.description:
Three equimolar gas samples are at the conditions given in the following table. Assume that the gases behave ideally.

content.question: The number of moles of <math alttext="N 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi mathvariant="italic">g</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> is closest to which of the following?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
